# Roles & Permissions

CeleroPress uses a simple role system with two main roles: **Owner** and **Member**. Each role has specific permissions that determine what actions team members can perform.

## The Two Roles at a Glance

CeleroPress uses a simplified role model with only two active roles:

### Owner

**The Owner has absolute control over the organization:**

- ‚úÖ **Full access** to all features and areas
- ‚úÖ **Team management**: Invite members, change roles, remove members
- ‚úÖ **Billing & Subscription**: Manage subscription, change payment methods, view invoices
- ‚úÖ **Critical actions**: Delete account, transfer ownership
- ‚úÖ **All work areas**: CRM, Library, Projects, Analytics with full rights

**Special characteristics:**
- There is **exactly one Owner** per organization
- The Owner **cannot be removed**
- The Owner role can only be transferred to another member via **Owner Transfer**
- The original Owner automatically becomes a Member

### Member

**Members have full access to all work functions:**

- ‚úÖ **CRM**: Create, edit, delete, import publishers, journalists, distribution lists
- ‚úÖ **Library**: Manage publications, text modules, media, brand DNA
- ‚úÖ **Projects**: Create projects, write press releases, send, manage approvals
- ‚úÖ **Analytics**: View monitoring and reporting
- ‚úÖ **Communication**: Use inbox, receive notifications
- ‚úÖ **Team**: See other team members (but not manage)
- ‚ùå **No admin rights**: Cannot manage team, cannot change billing settings

**Typical use cases:**
- PR managers who independently create and send campaigns
- Team members who work with the software daily
- Freelancers or external staff with full work access

## Permissions in Detail

Here's an overview of what each role can do:

| Area | Owner | Member |
|------|-------|--------|
| **CRM (Contacts)** |
| View publishers | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Create/edit publishers | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Delete publishers | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| View journalists | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Create/edit journalists | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Manage distribution lists | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Import contacts | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Export contacts | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| **Library** |
| Manage publications | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Create text modules | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Upload media | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Delete media | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Share media | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Edit brand DNA | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| **Projects & Campaigns** |
| View projects | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Create projects | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Write press releases | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Send emails | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Delete projects | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| **Approvals** |
| Create approval links | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Process feedback | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| **Team & Admin** |
| View team | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Invite team members | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Change roles | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Remove members | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| **Billing & Account** |
| View invoices | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Change subscription | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Change payment method | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |
| Delete account | ‚úÖ | ‚ùå |

## Change a Member's Role

**Only the Owner can change roles:**

1. Go to **Settings ‚Üí Team**
2. Find the member in the list
3. Click on the **dropdown menu** in the "Role" column
4. Select the new role:
   - **Member** ‚Äì Standard work role
   - **Make Owner** ‚Äì Transfers the Owner role (see below)

> **Tip:** You cannot change your own role. Only other members can be edited.

## Transfer Owner Role

**What happens during an Owner transfer?**

When you make a member the Owner, the following happens:

1. ‚ö†Ô∏è **You lose Owner rights** and automatically become a Member
2. ‚úÖ The selected member becomes the new Owner
3. üîÑ The new Owner has full control over the organization from now on
4. üí≥ Billing and subscription are assigned to the new Owner

**How to transfer the Owner role:**

1. Go to **Settings ‚Üí Team**
2. Select **"Make Owner"** for the desired member
3. Confirm the warning in the dialog
4. The change is **immediately effective** and cannot be undone

> **‚ö†Ô∏è Important:** This process is final! You can only get the Owner role back if the new Owner transfers it back to you.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Can a Member invite other members?**

No, only the Owner can invite new members. Members can see the team but cannot manage it.

**Can multiple people be Owners?**

No, there is always exactly one Owner per organization. However, the Owner role can be transferred.

**Can the Owner be removed?**

No, the Owner cannot be removed from the organization. If you want to give up ownership, you must first transfer it to another member.

**What about Admin, Client, and Guest roles?**

These roles were used in earlier versions but are no longer active. Existing members with these roles will still be displayed, but new invitations only use Owner and Member.

**Can Members delete projects?**

No, only the Owner can permanently delete projects. Members can create, edit, and send projects, but not delete them.

**Who can edit the brand DNA?**

Both Owners and Members can edit the brand DNA. This function is important for daily work and is therefore available to everyone.

**Can a Member see who's on the team?**

Yes, all team members can view the team list under **Settings ‚Üí Team**. But only the Owner can invite members, change roles, or remove them.

## Best Practices

### Choose the Right Role

- **Owner** only for the person who manages the organization and controls billing
- **Member** for everyone else who works with CeleroPress daily
- Regularly review who is the Owner ‚Äì especially during personnel changes

### Security

- Only transfer the Owner role to trusted individuals
- Document Owner transfers (e.g., during personnel changes)
- Ensure the Owner account is secured with 2FA

### Team Size

- Maximum team size depends on your subscription tier
- STARTER: up to 5 users
- BUSINESS: up to 15 users
- AGENCY: up to 50 users

## Next Steps

- [Invite team members](/support/en/erste-schritte/team-einladen)
- [Manage team members](/support/en/einstellungen/team-mitglieder-verwalten)
- [Set up two-factor authentication](/support/en/erste-schritte/zwei-faktor-authentifizierung)
